# My Environment

## Tools

### Desktop

- Windows
  - Arch Linux on Hyper-V
- Chrome, Firefox
- iTunes, Spotify
  - Voicemeeter Banana
  - Lyrics Master
- Slack, Discord
- Vim, VS Code
- zsh, tmux

## Web

- Google Workspace
- Scrapbox, iCloud Notes
- Todoist
- Twitter Web App
